mapper.select: SELECT bno, writer, title, regdate from (Select ROWNUM rn, a.* from (Select bno, writer, title, regdate from tbl_board order by bno desc) a where ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (bno, title, content, writer, regdate) values(seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate)
